root.name: Spider-Man: Total Mayhem
root.description: Overview Spider-Man: Total Mayhem is an iOS and Xperia Play game where you play as Spider Man and must protect the city of Manhattan against super villains such as R.H.I.N.O and Doc Oc. On IOS devices, you control Spider-Man with a virtual D-pad and buttons. You can kick and punch as well as web swing and use you spider sense by taping the screen. On the Xperia Play version of the game, you can use the devices D-pad or analogue nubs to move around and you must use the buttons on the right of the device to fight. The game cannot be played with the slider closed and you must use the touchscreen for spider sense and navigating menus. The game also has a variety of quick time events that require you to slide your finger across the screen or tap the screen as fast as you can. Fun FactsYou can find Hidden comic book covers. Takes place in the Ultimate universe. On the title screen it says Ultimate Spider-Man: Total Mayhem but in the iTunes app store it is called Spider-Man: Total Mayhem.
